articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD
articles.title: Heat wave bakes southern Europe, sparking warnings to stay inside - The Associated Press
articles.description: Italian health authorities are intensifying heat warnings as southern Europe enters a brutally hot week. Italy's Ministry of Health urged people to stay indoors during the hottest hours and to drink at least 1.5 liters of water a day, and it advised regions t…
articles.content: ROME (AP) Italian health officials intensified heat warnings Monday as southern Europe began a brutally hot week with temperatures expected to top 40 degrees Celsius or 104 degrees Fahrenheit on a co… [+4615 chars]
